entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Labrador City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:46 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -39.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 02:51 AM AST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -39.5°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -43.2°C
Wind: SSE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 12:15 AM AST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 12:15 AM AST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 12:15 AM AST Monday 30 January 2023
